      • generateString

        public String generateString()
        Generates string representation of the whole drawing. Used for storing drawing in vector graphic file format.
        Returns:
        string representation of the drawing.

      • rasterize

        public BufferedImage rasterize()
        Creates rasterized BufferedImage from the vector drawing.
        Returns:
        rasterized image.

      • getFilename

        public Optional<Path> getFilename()
        Getter for the filename in which the drawing is saved.
        Returns:
        Optional which is empty if no filename is set, or contains path to the file otherwise.

        filename - new Optional.

        public void clear()
        Clears the drawing, i.e. removes all GeometricObject objects from it.
